backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a tic-tac-toe game backend with win/tie detection, score counting, and a `updateGameState` function that returns game features including points and game field state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the APP_NAME constant in `frontend/src/branding.ts` has been updated to 'TickTockTask', with high confidence and test ID REQ-1.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose, key APIs used, and notable implementation details for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart, and destructive color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, loading the Quicksand font from Google Fonts and setting the page title to 'TickTockTask - Multi-timer with customizable backgrounds'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all providers (query, router, background, music, alerts, sounds), renders a stable media layer, timer overlay for fullscreen, and a tab-based multi-timer UI with error boundary.
frontend/src/branding.ts: Single-export module defining the APP_NAME constant as 'TickTockTask', serving as the single source of truth for app branding.
frontend/src/features/alerts/alertSounds: Defines available alert sound options and provides a `playAlertSound` utility that plays built-in tones (beep, chime, bell, ping) via the Web Audio API or custom/YouTube sounds via URL.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlertS: Settings UI card for timer alerts, allowing users to enable/disable alerts, select a completion sound (including custom sounds), and preview the selected sound.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlerts: React context provider managing timer alert state (enabled toggle, selected sound) with localStorage persistence, and exposing `notifyCompletion` and `previewSound` functions that play audio and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: React component that renders a UI for setting the app background via file upload, direct URL, or YouTube URL, with controls for brightness, volume, and timer overlay toggle.
Floating button component that toggles browser fullscreen mode on the background stage element, only rendered when an active background exists.
Floating play/pause button rendered only when a video or YouTube background is active and not in fullscreen, delegating playback toggling to the background context.
React context provider that wraps the `useBackground` hook and exposes background state and actions to child components, while also managing blob URL cleanup.
Renders the active background (image, video, or YouTube player) fullscreen behind the app, handling play/pause control, error states, and spacebar keyboard shortcut.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame Player API script once and returns a shared promise that resolves when the API is ready. Also declares global TypeScript types for the YT player interface.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Provides utility functions for inferring media type from MIME types or URLs, validating URLs, generating error messages, and probing whether a URL loads as an image or video.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Custom React hook that manages background state (image, video, or YouTube) with localStorage persistence, boot-time validation of persisted backgrounds, and controls for brightness, volume, and playback.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Memoized component that initializes and manages a YouTube IFrame player sized to cover the viewport, supporting play/pause, volume control, looping, and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses various YouTube URL formats to extract video IDs and builds optimized YouTube embed URLs with autoplay, loop, and IFrame API parameters.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: React context provider that exposes music state and controls from the useMusic hook to child components via a MusicContext.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI component for configuring music playback, allowing users to input a Spotify, Apple Music, or direct audio URL and adjust volume via a slider.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Renders the appropriate audio playback element—a hidden audio tag for direct audio, or off-screen iframes for Spotify and Apple Music embeds—based on the active music source type.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses music URLs to classify them as Spotify, Apple Music, direct audio, or unknown, and converts share links into embeddable URLs.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: Custom React hook that manages music playback state (source URL, type, embed URL, volume) with localStorage persistence and an audio element ref for direct audio control.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Navigat: Settings UI component that displays instructions for drag-reordering navigation tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to its default.
frontend/src/features/navigation/navigat: Defines the NavigationTabId type, tab definitions, default order array, and a helper to look up a tab's label by ID.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Reorder: Navigation tab bar component that supports pointer-based drag-and-drop reordering via a grip handle, updating the tab order on drop.
frontend/src/features/navigation/useNavi: Custom hook that loads, persists, and normalizes the navigation tab order from localStorage, with a reset function to restore the default order.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Sheet component that displays the current URL for sharing, with copy-to-clipboard and open-in-new-tab actions, and a warning when running inside an embedded preview iframe.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook that detects whether the app is running inside an iframe by comparing window.self to window.top, returning true if embedded.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: Background component that polls reminders every 10 seconds and triggers a notification via the alerts system when a reminder's due date has passed.
UI component for managing reminders, providing dialogs to add and edit reminders with a title and datetime, and displaying them sorted by due date with delete and edit actions.
frontend/src/features/reminders/useRemin: Custom hook that manages a list of reminders in localStorage, exposing add, update, and delete operations with stable callbacks.
frontend/src/features/sounds/CustomSound: React context provider that manages custom sounds state, including adding/removing/reordering sounds via URL or file upload, volume control, and preview playback with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/features/sounds/customSound: Utility module for persisting custom sounds to localStorage, including load/save with size validation, sound ID generation, file-to-data-URL conversion, and audio file type validation.
frontend/src/features/sounds/SoundCustom: UI panel component for managing custom sounds, offering add/edit/delete/reorder (drag-and-drop and buttons) functionality with dialogs for URL or file upload input and a volume slider.
frontend/src/features/sounds/useSoundPan: Custom hook that tracks and persists the sound panel's visible/hidden state to localStorage.
frontend/src/features/sounds/youtubeSoun: Module that plays audio from YouTube URLs using the IFrame API via a hidden player, with auto-stop after a configurable duration and cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: Countdown timer UI card component with editable hours/minutes/seconds inputs, play/pause/reset controls, and completion alert notification.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Custom hook implementing countdown timer logic with accurate interval tracking, pause/resume support, completion callback, and duration persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: React component rendering an interval timer card with work/rest display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable settings for interval durations and rounds.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Custom hook managing interval timer state (work/rest intervals, rounds, countdown) with localStorage persistence, accurate tick logic, and start/pause/reset/skip controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/navigation/: React component providing drag-and-drop reorderable timer navigation tabs using pointer events, with visual offset animations during dragging.
Defines the list of available timer modes with their labels, the default tab order, and a helper function to look up a mode's display label.
Small settings UI component that displays instructions for reordering timer tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to default.
Custom hook that loads, persists, and normalizes the timer tab order from localStorage, with deduplication and missing-mode recovery.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: React component rendering a Pomodoro timer card with segment display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable work/break durations and long-break interval.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro timer state including work/short-break/long-break segments, completed pomodoro count, localStorage persistence, and accurate countdown logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: React component rendering a repeating timer card with play/pause/reset controls, a time display, completed repeat count, and settings for duration and repeat count (including infinite mode).
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Custom hook managing repeating timer state (countdown, repeat cycling, pause/resume) with localStorage persistence and an optional onComplete callback.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Anim: SVG component that renders two animated concentric arc rings representing seconds (outer) and minutes (inner) progress, with tick marks and a moving dot indicator.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Controlled numeric text input component that allows inline editing with clamping to min/max on blur and supports keyboard confirmation/cancellation.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Minu: Composite input component that splits a total-seconds value into separate minutes and seconds EditableNumberInput fields and recombines them on change.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: Draggable rotary dial component that maps pointer/touch drag angle to a numeric value within a min/max range, displaying the current value with a rotating indicator dot.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions for formatting a total-seconds value into HH:MM:SS or MM:SS strings, and milliseconds into a similar format with centisecond precision.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Custom hook that sets up a setInterval with a stable callback ref, only running when the `running` flag is true and cleaning up on stop or unmount.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: React component rendering a stopwatch UI card with start/pause, reset, and lap recording controls, displaying elapsed time and a scrollable lap history.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Custom hook managing stopwatch state (elapsed time, running status, laps) with start, pause, reset, and lap recording actions using an accurate interval.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: Fixed bottom toolbar component showing a wall clock and toggle controls for timer visibility, music, alerts, settings, and sharing.
Fixed top-left clock display that shows the current time and hides itself when an active background (image, video, or YouTube) is set.
Custom hook managing timer and toggle visibility state with localStorage/sessionStorage persistence, and auto-hiding the timer when a background becomes active.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light/dark OKLCH CSS custom properties for the design system and utility classes for drag animations and drop targets.
frontend/src/lib/safeStorage.ts: Utility wrapping localStorage and sessionStorage with error handling and an in-memory fallback for restricted environments like iframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch CSS variables, typography, border radius, box shadow, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state at version 3, recording one existing feature that updates the APP_NAME constant in branding.ts to 'TickTockTask' with no new feature requests or known issues.
